channel.title: Comments on: We don’t speak the same language,but we hear each other.
channel.description: tales in the life of Madeline Ann Downey

item.title: By: Jonas
item.dc:creator: Jonas
item.description: If I said "yes" would that be a good or bad thing? :)
item.content:encoded: If I said “yes” would that be a good or bad thing?

item.title: By: Carrie
item.dc:creator: Carrie
item.description: I often want chocolate, bacon and attention. Does that make me a cat?
item.content:encoded: I often want chocolate, bacon and attention. Does that make me a cat?

item.title: By: Sandy
item.dc:creator: Sandy
item.description: The Kitty would make a perfect movie villian. She scares the crap out of me.
item.content:encoded: The Kitty would make a perfect movie villian. She scares the crap out of me.

item.title: By: Tracy
item.dc:creator: Tracy
item.description: Oh she is so precious! Are you using a sleep tracking sheet? Begin timing her durations and times down to the hour/minutes. As she goes through her growth spurts, they will stretch out, and you can time when she will sleep longer, thank God. Make sure to put on soft music that isn't interesting at bedtime as you are winding her down. Make it boring and an evening bath will make her sleep better. The photos are so cute - love the one with Echo the Bunny man and the commentary too! Love, Aunt Tracy
item.content:encoded:
Oh she is so precious! Are you using a sleep tracking sheet? Begin timing her durations and times down to the hour/minutes. As she goes through her growth spurts, they will stretch out, and you can time when she will sleep longer, thank God. Make sure to put on soft music that isn’t interesting at bedtime as you are winding her down. Make it boring and an evening bath will make her sleep better. The photos are so cute – love the one with Echo the Bunny man and the commentary too!
Love, Aunt Tracy
